chunk:
Arganat Glamour Mask Instant Glow (2019 formulation)

Brand: Arganat

Category: Mask

Ingredients: KAOLINITE (FRENCH WHITE CLAY), AQUA, KAOLINITE (MOROCCAN RED CLAY), ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER, ARGANIA SPINOSA OIL, MARIS SAL, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER OIL, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA FLOWER WATER, ORIGANUM VULGARE LEAF EXTRACT, ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER OIL, CITRUS AURANTIUM AMARA (BITTER ORANGE) FLOWER OIL, CITRUS MEDICA LIMONUM (LEMON)

OFFICINALIS FLOWER OIL, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA FLOWER WATER, ORIGANUM VULGARE LEAF EXTRACT, ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER OIL, CITRUS AURANTIUM AMARA (BITTER ORANGE) FLOWER OIL, CITRUS MEDICA LIMONUM (LEMON) OIL, CITRUS AURANTUM BERGAMIA (BERGAMOT) OIL, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMERY) LEAF OIL.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
